data.text:
@WelshConserv @Conservatives @UKGovWales @Simonhartmp Levelling up is a hollow slogan designed to cover up the huge loss in EU funding which is not going to be replaced.

#ToryLiars #BrexitShambles #ToryRussiaMoney https://t.co/ojEy7p0JwR

@WelshConserv @Conservatives @UKGovWales @Simonhartmp Levelling up. Reduced funding since Brexit despite promise of not to @BorisJohnson @Simonhartmp @DavidTCDavies @SCrabbPembs @AndrewRTDavies @WelshConserv  explain that please

@WelshConserv @Conservatives @UKGovWales @Simonhartmp The UK government belatedly going through the scam of what it should have been doing for 100+ years before devolution. A pity your levelling up is really a levelling down of everywhere outside the  M25

@WelshConserv @Conservatives @UKGovWales @Simonhartmp Levelling up = hoovering up. Public money going to private enterprise in selected areas facilitating the Tory vote as a side benefit. #ToryCorruption
@WelshConserv @Simonhartmp @Conservatives @UKGovWales Tories are supporting their friends in Russia - or party donors as we like to call them, while telling people they are doing something different
